title: Which Greek island is famous for producing high-quality olive oil and is also the largest in the country?

title: What is the largest Greek island whose capital city is Heraklion?
text: The capital of this island is Heraklion.

title: Which large Greek island is not only famous for its size and history but also for tales of local mobs?
text: The island is known for its mobs.
